roleset.name: move with difficulty
roleset.note: HEAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'heave' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 12 and 11.4-1. (from heave.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: active
example.text: The cuckoo prefers the nests of other birds and heaves out their eggs.

example.name: passive
example.text: So it was passed in an unusual way, and it was heaved over the finish line with no Republican support.

roleset.name: fixed phrase: heave a sigh
roleset.note: HEAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'heave' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 12 and 11.4-1. (from heave.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: predictable
example.text: Silicon Valley heaved a sigh of relief yesterday.

roleset.name: rise up, move unpleasantly
roleset.note: HEAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'heave' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 12 and 11.4-1. (from heave.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: mmm, home cooking
example.text: John's stomach was heaving after eating the dinner that Mary made for him.
example.arg: after eating the dinner that Mary made for him
